byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: Sen Marco Rubio, in effort to bolster campaign, aggressively attacks Donald J Trump's business ethics, hiring policies and financial record during lively and acrimonious Republican presidential debate; fiery exchanges between the two erupt in shouting while Sen Ted Cruz, also seeking to target front-runner, once again assails Trump's values.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio, alarmed by Donald Trump’s ascendancy and worried that his presidential chances were slipping away, delivered the onslaught that Republican leaders had desperately awaited.

headline.main: In Republican Debate, a Feisty Marco Rubio Lays Into Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Rubio and Trump Erupt in Shouts at Angry Debate

snippet: Senator Marco Rubio, alarmed by Donald Trump’s ascendancy and worried that his presidential chances were slipping away, delivered the onslaught that Republican leaders had desperately awaited.
